caption: Device Config State Change
description: Device Config State Change events report state changes that impact the security of the device.
name: device_config_state_change

device.description: The device that is impacted by the state change.

prev_security_states.description: The previous security states of the device.

security_states.description: The current security states of the device.

state.caption: Application Lifecycle State
state.description: The Application Lifecycle State, normalized to the caption of the state_id value. In the case of 'Other', it is defined by the source.

state_id.caption: Application Lifecycle ID
state_id.description: The security state of the managed entity.

99.caption: Other
99.description: The Application Lifecycle is not mapped. See the state attribute, which contains data source specific values.

0.caption: Unknown
0.description: The Application Lifecycle state is unknown.
